description: box with sliding lid; carved with reclining figure with head in high relief on top, surrounded by faces at top and bottom edges (all have inlaid shell features); one long side carved with four standing figures flanking four faces; opposite long side carved with figure at PL, large animal with antenae (or horns?) at PR and two snakes at center; one short side carved with two rows of faces; opposite short side carved with one face and a horned animal
title: Storage Box
